content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-08800" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-function-context" groupId="org.springframework.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-cloud-function-context" groupId="org.springframework.cloud"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Cloud Function">
                    <description>The application embeds Spring Cloud Function.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Cloud Function</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
